name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NFTab üçÑ NFTs in your New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your new tab with your own collection of NFTs or popular NFTs daily from OpenSea

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NFTab is a gallery for your NFTs. Enjoy your collection everytime you open a new tab.

üçÑ How it works:

- Enter your Eth wallet address
- Customize your new tab to show your NFTs

Roadmap:
- Launch: Support OpenSea and Eth NFTs
- Future: Add additional wallet functionality

Because NFTab is your new tab, it requires the permission to replace your new tab.
